com.example.bookswap

Class DataBaseUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.bookswap.DataBaseUtil

  • public class DataBaseUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is for DataBase developers can use it easily they can add book and get book from database they can check book status and other info
